ResearchProjectDef.label: Bladed weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Smith an array of bladed weapons.
"Anyone who thinks the pen is mightier than the sword has not been stabbed with both." - Lemony Snicket

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mechanization
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build machines to further increase work-speed and create advanced structures.
"I think the human race made a big mistake at the beginning of the Industrial Revolution, we leaped for the mechanical things. People need the use of their hands to feel creative." - Andre Norton

ResearchProjectDef.label: Fitted armor
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Craft a variety of flexible, form fitting armors.
"With the advance of feudalism came the growth of iron armor, until, at last, a fighting-man resembled an armadillo." - John Boyle O’Reilly

ResearchProjectDef.label: Daylight braziers
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Build coal fueled, reflective braziers, capable of creating enough light to grow crops.
“Green was the silence, wet was the light, the month of June trembled like a butterfly.” - Pablo Neruda

ResearchProjectDef.label: Large crossbows
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Construct large crossbows used often in sieges and siege defense.
"All the best romances bloom in the midst of a good siege." - Miles Cameron
